entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle is a person who has a wild happiness on his face when he found out that he was a wizard. He leaves the scene after saying 'I won't say a word, sir'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who had glimpsed Riddle's face and thanked Dumbledore for letting him go.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who was already sitting down behind his desk when Harry landed back on the office floor. He has been working on a theory that got confirmed by this piece of evidence.

relationships.description: Harry had glimpsed Riddle's face before he left.
Dumbledore let Harry go after thanking him.
Dumbledore has been hoping for this piece of evidence that confirms his theory.
